PhyMediumComments: black-and-white: Agfa Superpan Supreme safety film
CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 12, 1941, pg. 18, reads: "Bathing Beauties Who Won Top Honors at Pittsburgh's B. P. A. Picnic - Many Attend BPA Picnic on Fourth - The fourth annual picnic of the Business and Professional Men's Association at South Park on the Fourth of July..."Cutline for related image and article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 23, 1941, pg. 9, reads: "BATHING BEAUTIES TO BE HOSTESSES - These bathing beauties will be hostesses to the Trade Week Prom at St. Moritz hall, September 10, a feature of Trade Week sponsored by the Business and Professional Association."
TitMainTitle: Beauty contestants modeling bathing suits and sashes including #12 "Nesbit's Pie Shop," #1 Frances Moore "Cardwell Dawson,"  #13 Lois Gaines Hall Thomas "BPA," #14 Ernestine Holloway "Princess Beauty," and #17 Ruth Sharpe Barnett, "Trower Tailors," at South Park Pool for Business and Profession Men's Association picnic
